鮶字的基本解释

鮶
jūn
见“鲪”。

鮶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jūn］
［《廣韻》舉云切，平文，見。］
“鲪1”的繁体字。
鱼类的一属。体狭长，侧扁，灰褐色，有不规则黑色斑纹。口大而斜。尾鳍圆形。卵胎生。生活于近海岩礁间。

鮶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮶； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1470第12
【廣韻】舉云切【集韻】拘云切，?音君。水鮶，蟲名。似魚。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jūn］
["Guang Yun" cite the cloud cut, plain text, see. ]
Traditional characters for "鲪1".
A genus of fish. The body is long and narrow, with flat sides, gray-brown, with irregular black markings. The mouth is big and slanted. The tail fin is round. Oviparous. Lives among offshore rocks.
鮶

[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮶; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1470 Page 12
[Guang Yun] Ju Yun Qi [Ji Yun] Ju Yun Qi,? Yin Jun. Water catfish, insect name. Like a fish.
